dc_title_s: Americae mappa generalis: secundum legitimas projectionis stereographicae regulas relationesque recentissimas et observationes socioru Acad. reg. sc quoe Parisiis ...; nunc concinata et delineata ab Aug. Gottl. Boehmio.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Prime meridian: Ferro. Decorative cartouche includes 4 Native Americans in their local costumes. Two hold hunting materials and food while two volcanoes erupt in the background. 1 map: col.; 46.6 x 53.3 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Boehme, August Gottlieb, 1719-1797.,Dahl, James, former owner.,Homann Erben (Firm)
